headline: PG&E Readies Resources, Crews Ahead of Storm Bringing Heavy Rain and Wind to Northern California
summary: Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) has positioned crews and resources across its service area to support the safe and swift response repair to damage and restore power outages that may result from the forecasted heavy rain and strong winds that will impact much of Northern California beginning today and through the weekend. The National Weather Service has issued advisories, watches, and warnings throughout portions of the territory; these can be viewed on the PG&E Weather Map.
